results.name: Number of solutions to n^2=b^2+c^2 [with c>=b>=0].
link: Michael Gilleland, Some Self-Similar Integer Sequences
formula: a(0) = 1; a(n) = A046080(n) + 1 for n > 0. - [amended by _Georg Fischer_, Jan 25 2020]
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 26 2001
